revision.text: Possibly volumes 12, 18 & 21 from: Lo Stato Presente di Tutti I Paesi, E Popoli del Mondo Naturale, Politico, e Morale, con nuove osservazioni, e correzioni degli antichi, e moderni viaggiatori, by Thomas Salmon. 25v. (In Venezia : Presso Giambatista Albrizzi q. Gir., [1740-61]). Record for Vol. 13 at http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2434007~S1. This is the Italian translation of Modern History, or the present State of all Nations, by Thomas Salmon. (London: Printed for James Crokatt, 1726). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/722369724
